name: Marquee Productions Inc
overview:
Marquee is the first 3D Global Entertainment Network exclusively built to serve the Entertainment industry and provide a platform for professional and independently produced content.

Marquee provides a distribution platform and discovery for independent artists and content owners in Music, Film, Television, Theater, Fashion, and the Arts.accessible to a worldwide audience over browser, app and mobile devices.

Marquee’s is built to support user-generated content and provides all the tools to populate, perform, engage and monetize. Marquee uniquely presents entertainment in real time to live audiences worldwide.

Professional content owners can utilize Marquee’sâ„¢ platform for new distribution and syndication, complementing programming and engaging audiences in real time and expanding reach into previously untapped markets.
